result.title: Report about market structure and development, key actors, and quality requirements for cellulose, hemicellulose and lignin
result.description: D64 is a public report that will assess the enduser markets for the industrial applications of the projects products and technologies eg vanillin insulation materials etc The report will include information about market structure and development trends key actors and quality requirements for lignin hemicellulose and cellulose The report targets the European market and will be focused to meet the interests of the project partners
